itemDescription: businessperson and Clerk of the Council of the Duchy of Lancaster

wikipedia_page.main: Sir Paul Robert Virgo Clarke, KCVO (born 1953) is a former Clerk of the Council of the Duchy of Lancaster, a position he held from 2000 until 2013.
